meanings.definition: A person who writes computer programs.
meanings.sent1: The coders at the tech company work hard every day.
meanings.sent2: Many coders enjoy solving complex problems through coding.
meanings.sent3: The coders had a coding competition to see who could create the best program.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, coders are the architects of the digital realm.
meanings.sent5: The coders' creativity knows no bounds when it comes to programming.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who write computer programs.
meanings.sent1: The coders in the team collaborate to develop new software.
meanings.sent2: At the hackathon, various coders showcased their innovative projects.
meanings.sent3: The coders celebrated their successful project completion with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: In the coding bootcamp, the coders formed strong bonds while learning together.
meanings.sent5: The coders' teamwork and dedication led to the creation of a groundbreaking app.
